author: randy
msg: Fix a buffer overflow problem which could allow unauthorized access.
Reviewed by: Marc Slemko, Randy Terbush, Ben Laurie

author: randy
msg: Fix a problem in get_path_info() which would allow a very long URL with
many '/' characters to convince the server to return an index for the
DocumentRoot. Properly check errno for stat().
Reviewed by: Randy Terbush, Ben Laurie

author: akosut

author: chuck
